name: Vans
bio: Vans is a renowned sportswear company based in the US, celebrated for its iconic footwear and apparel.

name: Quiksilver
bio: Quiksilver is a leading sportswear brand known for its surf-inspired designs and high-quality products.

name: Roxy
bio: Roxy, a subsidiary of Quiksilver, specializes in fashionable and performance-driven women's sportswear.

name: ONeal
bio: ONeal is a prominent player in the motocross apparel industry, offering innovative and durable products.

name: RipCurl
bio: RipCurl is a globally recognized surfwear company with a strong commitment to the surfing community.

name: Volcom
bio: Volcom is a lifestyle brand catering to skateboarding, snowboarding, and surfing enthusiasts worldwide.

name: Burton
bio: Burton is a trailblazing company in snowboarding equipment and apparel, dedicated to empowering snowboarders.

name: Billabong
bio: Billabong is an iconic surf brand that embodies the surfing lifestyle and resonates with customers worldwide.

name: Montec
bio: Montec is a rising name in the sportswear sector, known for its commitment to performance and style.

name: Dope
bio: Dope is a fashion-forward brand known for its urban streetwear and accessories, embracing individuality and self-expression.

name: New Balance
bio: New Balance is a renowned sportswear company recognized for its high-quality athletic footwear and apparel.

name: Reebok
bio: Reebok, a well-established brand, is synonymous with performance-driven athletic shoes and apparel.

name: Patagonia
bio: Patagonia is a leading outdoor clothing company known for its sustainable and eco-friendly approach to sportswear.

name: Under Armour
bio: Under Armour is a prominent sportswear brand, specializing in innovative and technologically advanced athletic apparel.

name: Lululemon
bio: Lululemon is a top-tier company famous for its premium yoga-inspired athletic wear and lifestyle apparel.
